column2: considering that the petitioners waited until the prosecution case to be concluded in

column1: order to plead guilty to a lesser offence.
Further it was  contended  for  the petitioners that the  alleged  incident took place in
the  year 2002  and  13  years  had passed by the time  the Learned Trial  Judge  made
his  judgment.  It  is  pertinent  to  note  that  the
column2: time  period  of a  trial  cannot  be
considered as  a mitigatory factor in imposing sentence on an accused since trials in

column1: our Courts take a considerable time period.
